traits.name: Master of Shadows
traits.desc: If the Maskhound hides, while shadowed, or is behind half-cover or more, the Maskhound goes invisible until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Maskhound makes two claw attacks, and one tail attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Mute
actions.desc: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. The whispy tendrils from the Maskhound's torso wrap around the target. The target is silenced, and blinded for 1 turn.

monsters.name: Forest Plagued
monsters.languages: understands Druidic and Terran, but can't speak.

traits.name: Regrowth
traits.desc: The Forest Plagued regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and hadn't moved its previous turn, and is currently grounded. If it is on fire during regrowth, it will forgo the 10 hit points and douse the fire instead.

traits.name: Creeping Vine
traits.desc: The Forest Plagued can mutate its bark-like flesh on command and allow it to climb difficult surfaces without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Adept Forester
traits.desc: The Forest Plagued can mutate its bark-like flesh on command to cross over difficult terrain, without .

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Forest Plagued makes two attacks, only one of which can be a aaa attack.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage, and 5 (1d6 + 2) poison damage.
